name: v1.3.7
body:
This is release v1.3.7 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Dusty Mabe <dusty@dustymabe.com> (12):
      00f5737 guest: Enterprise Linux 9 has landed
      e90bbdb guest: add Alma Linux support
      e76db4d guest: handle Alma/Rocky until fixes land upstream
      b77809e add support for owner, group, and mount_options
      b37e1e5 tests: switch config.ssh.insert_key to boolean in Vagrantfile
      dba8c30 Update to Fedora 36 for build container and test VM
      cc887ad guest: upload fuse module loading for FreeBSD
      08c1c83 sshfs_reverse_mount: fixup botched copy/paste
      bf72f0f sshfs_reverse_mount: create guest directory if not exists
      51be8cb sshfs_reverse_mount: use ruby Etc lib for owner/group
      3f13f07 Gemfile: bump to latest versions of vagrant and vagrant-libvirt
      f60ff0e version: bump to 1.3.7

Even Onsager <even.onsager@gmail.com> (3):
      ecb8c03 Add guest capabilities file for Rocky (based on CentOS)
      95e8ffc Add Rocky guest_capability to plugin.rb
      ade5564 Remove superfluous case/when (only rocky_8 exists)

name: v1.3.6
body:
This is release v1.3.6 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Dominique Leuenberger <dimstar@opensuse.org> (1):
      cc2757e synced_folder: Add directory for SUSE/openSUSE to find sftp-server

Dusty Mabe <dusty@dustymabe.com> (5):
      b5652a5 guest: centos: use lowercase for powertools repo
      c50fb6e More places where we can not pass file descriptors.
      4bef1db tests: update to use Fedora 34 vagrant box
      dd02818 Gemfile: bump to latest versions of vagrant and vagrant-libvirt
      0f5c864 version: bump to 1.3.6

Ian2020 <Ian2020@users.noreply.github.com> (1):
      2615783 Fix #120: do not pass our file descriptors to spawned children

name: v1.3.5
body:
This is release v1.3.5 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Adam Butler <Adam.J.Butler@gmail.com> (1):
      eb6446f Add CentOS guest support for compatibility with Vagrant v2.2.8+

Dan Čermák <dcermak@suse.com> (1):
      99a62bb Use /var/run/ -> /run symlink for tests

Dusty Mabe <dusty@dustymabe.com> (7):
      3bc01b5 guest: centos: add a few comments into sshfs_client.rb
      1a0f440 guest: centos: rename module with capital OS
      f4408e3 guest: redhat: reset back to pre-EL8 modifications
      04235d9 guest: redhat: add best-effort support for RHEL8
      b1d92d9 Update vagrant in Gemfile to 2.2.9
      596360a tests: update to use Fedora 32 vagrant box
      fa27379 version: bump to 1.3.5

body:
This is release v1.3.3 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

name: v1.3.2
body:
This is release v1.3.2 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Dusty Mabe <dusty@dustymabe.com> (9):
      bb9c2f5 remove tests - add build script

name: v1.3.1
body:
This is release v1.3.1 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin. This is a bugfix
release.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Shawn Smith (shawnpsmith@gmail.com)
  - bb57bbe Fix typo

Russell Haering (russellhaering@gmail.com)
  - 797f4d4 Run "apt-get update" before attempting to install sshfs in the guest

eater (hello@eaterofco.de)
  - fb2661b Fix lingering whitespaces at end of lines
  - 0c53e4f Add freebsd support

Here is the commit log of all commits in this release:

5cb3943 version: bump to 1.3.1
1793982 Gemfile/gemspec updates
ff8a417 Fixes for host path checking
799f36e synced_folder: add `sftp-server` gentoo folder
3b493c1 ssh-config: handle cases where there is no IdentityFile
bb57bbe Fix typo
797f4d4 Run "apt-get update" before attempting to install sshfs in the guest
fb2661b Fix lingering whitespaces at end of lines
0c53e4f Add freebsd support
313017c Support proxy mode for ssh connectivity
ee82c07 RELEASE: add some notes to release file
ba12edf add sudo to readlink and test -e commands
bdfdfa4 RELEASE: update notes
acfdc0f test: update test Vagrantfiles to F25

Git-EVTag-v0-SHA512: 91171f69b96c4fc4b23c8a6cc71a90044c1fbc3c2874b3d17eb0044419dac987253f604208259e8e09ee1093169486f9926934b0a2d3e79d76ce25ddf429e9ad

name: v1.3.0
body:
This is release v1.3.0 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin. This release
includes several bugfixes as well as adds the abilitly to reverse
mount folders from the guest back into the host on Mac OS X.

Here is the commit log of all commits in this release:

e8d7279 version: bump to 1.3.0
b3eae35 sshfs_forward_mount: exit check if dst path missing
fe4fcd5 sshfs_forward_mount: best effort for uninheriting
c0ba07d sshfs_forward_mount: fix some spacing
1e9a0cf sshfs_forward_mount: add link to win32-process upstream PR
9032543 tests: rework misc tests to include sym link test
d120bbf sshfs_forward_mount: properly check mounts that are sym links
a4abb8a cap: add sshfs_get_absolute_path guest capability
a8eb98b README: Update percentages of use cases
ca7dc7e sshfs_reverse_mount: add mac OS (darwin) support
26af654 sshfs_reverse_mount: make reverse mounts work with relative paths
411c08e sshfs_reverse_mount: delete some dead code
043056a sshfs_reverse_mount: remove loading of win32 module
5bb6867 RELEASE: update notes in release txt file
022d131 test: update notes in tests READMEs

Git-EVTag-v0-SHA512: e68178f14399e9b08b6d7a4d6b3f95a37b862f2583dc58e1ff5c09b1f33d91b1fdc5747b0e2ae9b7e08ef6e09acf0bbb606d5d7a3531904435474bc1cc46a2b2

body:
This is release v1.2.1 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin. This release is a
bugfix/docs release.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

a05b7ab Convert README file from markdown to asciidoc
3282831 support space in key file path
73660e1 test: update notes in tests READMEs
f91bd18 Gemfile: move to newer version of Vagrant

0070e43 RELEASE: Add rough steps for release process

name: v1.2.0
body:
This is release 1.2.0 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin. This release adds
support for mounting guest box directories back into the Vagrant host
as well as enhancing support for windows by using the win32-process
rubygem and fine tuning process creation there.

Thanks to the following contributors for patches during this release:

Hardy Ferentschik (hardy@hibernate.org)
- 2fa2514 Issue #27 Adding Cucumber tests
- 3b81711 Issue #27 Switching to win32-process for creating sub processes on Windows

Tomas Kral (tomas.kral@gmail.com)
- a90e309 Add /usr/lib/ssh to paths for finding sftp-server

Here is the commit log of all commits in this release:

860371e version: bump to 1.2.0
6f285cd sshfs_forward_mount: Don't inherit all file handles by default on Windows
900c627 README: add a FAQ - first entry about sshfs caching
ea1a80e README: fix examples to specify to use sshfs
4fd3fd3 README: fix a few typos
61ba845 tests: add in a vagrantfile for testing normal/slave/reverse mounts.
0070b14 README: Update for new reverse mounting capability
d3e4d8e Fix outdated comment.
bbe97da sshfs_reverse_mount: support for mounting guest folder into the host
5e59885 synced_folder: factor out forward mount functions
a90efa5 sshfs_forward_mount: fix typo
02935a6 sshfs_forward_mount: rename to sshfs_forward_mount.rb
9caebaa sshfs_mount: rename to sshfs_forward_mount
f0dbca9 caps: make guests subdir for capabilities
b7ac26c sshfs_mount: redirect STDERR streams to predictable files
7ffe5bd add some comments around win32-process
1aabefe add comments to the Rakefile to make it understandable
3a2558d gitignore: add .vagrant so .vagrant dirs get ignored
741d245 tests: add in Vagrantfiles for running tests in nested virt
7fa3809 tests: don't default to html output for cucumber
9297fd5 README: fix typo in the readme
7bd81c1 tests: add some notes for myself for the future
76336fa tests: add support for testing on libvirt
0f7efa7 tests: rename files based on last commit
aa0f6a9 tests: don't test mounting user's home dir in tests
2442e77 tests: remove --provider from vagrant up commands
2fa2514 Issue #27 Adding Cucumber tests
3b81711 Issue #27 Switching to win32-process for creating sub processes on Windows
f16f8e3 synced_folder: search in more places for cygwin executables
7c8285c sshfs_mount: redirect STDERR streams when spawning
c39a3d9 sshfs_mount: remove Process.kill() on failed mount
3de0aef sshfs_mount: reduce the time spent checking mount
e95cbc0 plugin: make vagrant sshfs a primary command
c8cb5da README: update readme with new options for vagrant sshfs command
69d02aa command: add --mount/--umount options to vagrant sshfs command
8f64fce synced_folder: add in functionality for unmount folders
b188343 locales: adjust mounting message to not be plural
a90e309 Add /usr/lib/ssh to paths for finding sftp-server

Git-EVTag-v0-SHA512: cb01dc706ff86d695a4f1abbea4ee64abfe9c29f59f7226e5a246bfa8b035887f9585374cd4cfdf88714ae336b07a722706732dcf5567ab0ed86725eaa037d8a

name: v1.1.0
body:
This is release 1.1.0 of the vagrant-sshfs plugin. This release adds
support for mounting folders using the slave option of sshfs which
means we no longer need to authenticate when doing simple desktop to
VM shared mounts. This should greatly simplify the user's life.

This change should not break existing deployments as the options that
were used previously should just be ignored. Please file any bugs if
you find issues.

Here is commit log of all commits in this release.

adfeefe version: bump to 1.1.0
cfc9956 Merge pull request #13 from dustymabe/dusty-sshfs-slave
e72eebc gemspec: update homepage/license
8074992 sshfs_mount: add support for appending user provided ssh/sshfs options
941ec99 sshfs_mount: improve log message output based on mount type
7676951 README: Update for new slave option. Do some reorg.
1676bb5 sshfs_mount: add option to send keepalives over the ssh connection
9104894 sshfs_mount: reorg ssh and sshfs cli options
a579609 synced_folder: convert to using slave ssh mount by default
e2fa8b8 synced_folder: add in find_executable utility function
4256e76 synced_folder: add in some comments, change arg name
91117f8 sshfs_mount: make mountpoint accessible to all
01cd3f0 sshfs_mount: Move sshfs_is_folder_mounted to top of file
ee65920 Add logger to files for printing debug information
c689284 Merge pull request #12 from dustymabe/dusty-fix-readme
432962c README: Fix wording around synced folder options
93a8480 README: Add in links to documention on using ssh keys

Git-EVTag-v0-SHA512: 45f8f3ef04061d4959632709f0b92f349da4995c19ffcaa4e3016ab1c4a5dc8dface4b34affdb8cc8d9eb3cfcdf075900c9629fe573912412d6072044e4478f4
